column1: Family and friends are invited to call from 6 to 8 p.m. on Wednesday and 8:15 to 9:15 a.m. on Thursday at the James J. Dougherty Funeral Home
column4: Levittown. Her funeral Mass will be celebrated on Thursday
column5: 10 a.m. at St. Michael the Archangel Church followed by Rite of Committal at Resurrection Cemetery.
